about_the_game:
Soar the skies as Toroa, the mighty albatross! Embark on its epic journey home across the vast ocean in this atmospheric, exploration adventure. Discover the wonders of an intricate ecosystem and unravel a mystery hidden in the depths of the sea.

Guided by the winds of atua (Māori God) of the weather, Tāwhirimātea, Toroa will travel through their past, present and future across boundless seas and skies to finally be reunited with their family.


  • Toroa have the largest wingspan in the world! Glide on dynamic wind currents and explore stylised landscapes, from calm seas to high above verdant islands and into dream-like cloudscapes.
  • Chat with and befriend a colourful cast of creatures from the South Pacific including dolphins, whales, penguins and more!
  • Take your time to search for peaceful encounters within each level, there are no enemies, violence or high stakes.
  • Trade kelp with creatures to gather friends into a flock who will follow you all the way to the end of your journey.
  • Collect a smorgasbord of tasty looking trash strewn about the ocean (NOT FOR CONSUMPTION)
  • A heartfelt story grounded in te ao Māori (the Māori world) about family, interconnectedness, past, present and future.
  • Listen to a lush soundtrack showcasing the beauty of taonga pūoro (Māori musical instruments) and experience the beauty of the Māori language with fully text translated dialogues and story.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 Home
  • Processor: Intel i7-4790 (quad core @ 3.60GHz) or equivalent
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 2080 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
  • Additional Notes: Minimum System Requirements will likely change with further testing

short_description: Toroa: Skycall is a relaxing, atmospheric flight game set across a variety of ecosystems over the vast Pacific Ocean. Play as an albatross embarking on its epic journey back home to land, gliding over seas, islands, dream-like clouds and stylized environments grounded in the Māori world.
